name: @sbtltv/mpv-texture
description: Native libmpv addon with GPU texture sharing for Electron

scripts.//build:native: Native addon only works on macOS (uses IOSurface). Windows/Linux use external mpv via --wid flag instead. Called explicitly in CI — NOT part of 'build' to prevent pnpm lifecycle from triggering node-gyp rebuild during electron-builder packaging (which nukes bundled dylibs).
scripts.build:native: node -e "process.platform === 'darwin' ? require('child_process').execSync('node-gyp rebuild', {stdio:'inherit'}) : console.log('[mpv-texture] Skipping native build — macOS only')"
